channel.title: Hmm error
channel.description:
I've been hosting my own server for like 2 weeks
I went to friends computer and download no-ip logged in and then Checked on fatesscape.no-ip.biz
After that i went and downloaded utorrent. i made the port the default one.
I downloaded my server files onto her comp and this error happened
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at Bulby.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36) at Bulby.Server.main(Server.java:57) Press any key to continue . . .
i did not have my server online and i unchecked fatesscape.no-ip.biz on no-ip and i got that

item.title: Hmm error
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Maybe changing how many connections per IP can connect to your server, see if that helps in any way. Changing it from 0-1 or 1-2 or whatever, it might work.
Good luck.

Read full topic

i x’d out and every thing
let me re do it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2010, 09:09:24 pm[/size][hr]yea still error i x’d out of my runserver.

item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Er ithink your server might have still been running on your computer
